directives.description: Defines the default value that will be used when an attribute or item is not found in Object/Array/Map.
Create script functions for dll or exe functions.
Change the name of the Gui window class from AutoHotkey GUI to another name.
Change the name of the main window class from AutoHotkey to another name.
Automatically load a functions from standard library. The search order is UserLib -> Resource LIB -> WinApi.
Set the default case-sensitive Settings for Map.
Don't throw error when target control is not found.
Don't throw error when target window  is not found.
The initialization expression is executed in load order before the script begins.

keywords.description: A function definition can be prefixed with 'macro ' to create a macro function. All undeclared variables within a macro function except parameters and local variables come from the scope of the caller.
